answers.answer: have u seen a doctor yet? you need to get checked because this could be a few things. diabetes, heart problem, lupus, and etc. you need to have these ruled out and then go from there.

question: i have bad abdominal pain, sometimes i feel like its a stabbing pain and sometimes its like a throbbing pain. my appetite has changed, i drink plenty of water yet im always thirsty and go to the toilet more often the usual. i have constant headaches, jaw aches and back pains. my hands sometimes shake and get this tingly feeling and i feel like throwing up.i feel dizzy and fatigue. i bruise really easy and my hairs falling out. whats wrong with me ?help..
title: help
